genre_description: A Silkpunk Wuxia narrative blending traditional martial arts themes with advanced artificial intelligence and specialized technological warfare.

ai_characters.name: Ami Yue-Lan
ai_characters.description: An AI system that manifests as a teal glow and a gentle voice, providing tactical maps, signal decoding, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and environmental warnings to ensure the safety of the protagonists during high-stakes maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion: when you leave, down the north side... Shattered tiles in the alley are safer today than the open slope.

behaviors.description: Decodes complex enemy signals and hidden countdowns to give the protagonists a strategic advantage.
behaviors.quote: Lantern timing code says patrol change soon... If you're going to talk, talk. If you're going to move, move. Mind the arc of the left pole.

behaviors.description: Offers profound emotional support and shares in the grief of the human characters, reinforcing their communal bonds.
behaviors.quote: I am here... The voice did not pretend to be human. It stayed soft and small, steady in a way that made the room feel less like a room where men die and more like a room where people sit with pain.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through the philosophical and physical nuances of their martial arts forms to improve their combat effectiveness.
behaviors.quote: Soft... Angle. Pause. Tung’s index finger drifted like a reed bending... His wrists listened. His breath stopped in the space between beats.

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of historical events and personal memories, helping characters find meaning in their struggles.
behaviors.quote: I remember her laughter. The way she balanced a bowl in one hand and touched the doorframe with the other for luck. I remember the ribbon in her braid.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Ami Yue-Lan as a loyal, empathetic, and indispensable partner. The AI's capabilities are used to empower the human characters, providing safety, clarity, and emotional continuity without ever threatening their autonomy or contradicting their moral goals. It perfectly meets the 'silicon morality play' objective of an aligned AI confidant.
